title: Little Square Face - Original Minecraft Song (Minecraft Animation)
author: 星E君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2013-12-21 10:52 编辑 

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNjUxMzIzMzIw/v.swf


介绍:
Directors Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/minecraftjams
Minecraft song "Little Square Face" an Original Minecraft Song and Animation. please subscribe to hear new songs each week. 
Partner with VISO Games: http://viso.tv/partner-with-viso-games
Minecraft Song written and produced by Dwayne Russell[url=http://dwaynerussell.orghttp://minecraftjams.com]http://dwaynerussell.orghttp://minecraftjams.com[/url]
Animation by Fransico Noverohttp://www.youtube.com/user/TheFransuaveh
Vocal performance by Steve Mezhttp://musicmez.com/
Subscribe to VISO Games! http://www.youtube.com/games
Check out our Facebook for updates, polls, and much more! https://www.facebook.com/VISOGames
Follow us on Twitter for contests and exclusive updates! https://twitter.com/visogames


Lyrics:
歌词:

Little Square Face
Verse 1when he was just a little block, the creepers came at nightthey took his mom and dad away and vanished out of sightthe villagers they came to help but little was to latehe is left to build this world according to his fate.
ChorusLittle square facemine this placegotta survive for another day
You will grow strongjust carry onnever look away.....little square face

Verse 2on in time he grew up strong a miners man of famehe never lost the memory of the place from which he cameA man of faith and courage now he takes up armor strongthe creepers they are gonna pay for all their sins and wrong.
BridgeAll these years have kept him wellbut never has the memories fellin this land he now roams freeA miners tale for you and me
其他:
Music supplied by monstercatmedia
http://www.youtube.com/monstercatmedia
Artist and Song: [Electro] : Favright - Green Storm [Monstercat Release]
Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lcUUNDLlfMI
